name: Divi Noble
senses: darkvision 120 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., passive Perception 16

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The divi makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Crushing Hand
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends  the divi can't use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target  and the target can't breathe.

actions.name: Stone Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Quake (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Amid deafening rumbling  the ground shakes in a 10-foot radius around a point on an earth or stone surface within 90 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain. Each non-elemental creature in the area makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw  taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage and falling prone on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The divi can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone without disturbing it.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The divis innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: alter self (can assume Medium or Large form), detect magic, stone shape, 3/day each: creation, move earth, passwall, tongues, 1/day each: conjure elemental (earth elemental only), plane shift (to Elemental Plane of Earth only)
